candlestick plots in d3

published 09 Jul 2011

So, for a while now I’ve been using protovis for visualizing data related to search quality (at work). Last week I was working on tweaking some plots, and had to check some documentation, and I saw the notice on the protovis main page that it’s no longer under active development, and their team is now focused on d3, a library which I had only looked at but never tried before. So, I figured I’d give it a whirl and work with it a bit before trying to buy the time to port all my protovis code at work to d3. It has a similar feel to working in protovis, but protovis “marks” are supplanted by actual svg elements. Here’s a candlestick chart of the AMZN stock price for the past few weeks :

Also, here’s a larger form of it (but for Google data).
